item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:15, topic:229395”][quote author=Holic link=topic=301777.msg2428596#msg2428596 date=1220737701]
Would this not catch that it’s null?

if (cg == null || m == null) { return false; }
Also, this line works too

System.out.println(cg.getClassName() + "." + m.getName());

just not creating the InstructionSearcher.
[/quote]just a guess, but the method is probably abstract[/quote]
Or native

Holic:
Just add a simple if(m.isAbstract() || m.isNative()) continue;

item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

Because either the class or the method you are assigning it is null…hence it wasnt able to find either the class or the method.

So, in short, I would say it is an issue with your method finder over your class finder. But it could be either.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

the bank:

Yes, but it isn’t, correct? So what is the superclass? Open the class in JBE and find out.

That’s not the problem, the problem is with this line.

InstructionSearcher search = new InstructionSearcher(cg, m);

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at com.mh.pbot.updater.InstructionSearcher.<init>(InstructionSearcher.java:29) at com.mh.pbot.updater.transforms.TNPC.process(TNPC.java:39) at com.mh.pbot.updater.Updater.processUpdates(Updater.java:137) at com.mh.pbot.updater.Updater.<init>(Updater.java:48) at com.mh.pbot.updater.Updater.main(Updater.java:37)

item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

So before I had been checking to see if the class’ superclassname equaled the class that I’ve hooked as entity, but this update seems to be character instead of entity.
I’m not sure what I’m missing here, but here’s my NPC transform stripped.

[code]package com.mh.pbot.updater.transforms;

import java.util.Map;

import org.apache.bcel.classfile.Method;
import org.apache.bcel.generic.ClassGen;
import org.apache.bcel.generic.ConstantPoolGen;

import com.mh.pbot.updater.InstructionSearcher;
import com.mh.pbot.updater.Transformer;
import com.mh.pbot.updater.Updater;

public class TNPC extends Transformer{
public boolean process(Map<String, ClassGen> classes) {

	ClassGen player = Updater.hmClasses.get("Player");
	ClassGen character = Updater.hmClasses.get("Character");
    
    if (character == null || player == null) {
    	return false;
    }
    
    for (ClassGen cg : classes.values().toArray(new ClassGen[0])) {
        if (cg.getSuperclassName().equals(character.getClassName()) && !cg.getClassName().equals(player.getClassName())) {
        	addInterface(cg, "hooks.NPC");
        } else {
            ConstantPoolGen cp = cg.getConstantPool();

            if (cp.lookupUtf8("gnp2 pos:") != -1) {
                for (Method m : cg.getMethods()) {
                	if (cg == null || m == null) {
                    	return false;
                    }
                	System.out.println(cg.getClassName() + "." + m.getName());
                	InstructionSearcher search = new InstructionSearcher(cg, m);
                }
            }
        }
    }
	return true;
}

}
[/code]

which returns

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at com.mh.pbot.updater.InstructionSearcher.<init>(InstructionSearcher.java:29) at com.mh.pbot.updater.transforms.TNPC.process(TNPC.java:39) at com.mh.pbot.updater.Updater.processUpdates(Updater.java:137) at com.mh.pbot.updater.Updater.<init>(Updater.java:48) at com.mh.pbot.updater.Updater.main(Updater.java:37)

Can anyone give me a hand on this one, this just started to happen.

Read full topic

Yeah I fixed a few, 17 now work with the current and previous version, just my NPC hook is still stuffed.

Probably because of the internal structure change.

Meh, I use the string “gnp2 pos:” to hook it. It’s nice!
